AlternativeExcessNetCapital.label: Alternative Excess Net Capital
AlternativeExcessNetCapital.description: The amount of net capital in excess of the alternative minimum required net capital.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Increase for Cost Recognition
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

AlternativeNetCapitalRequirement.label: Alternative Net Capital Requirement (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
AlternativeNetCapitalRequirement.description: Total net capital requirement computed under the alternative method allowed under regulatory reporting requirements.

Capital.label: Banking Regulation, Total Capital, Actual
Capital.description: Amount of total capital as defined by regulatory framework.

CapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacy.label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
CapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacy.description: Amount of minimum total risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

CapitalRequiredToBeWellCapitalized.label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
CapitalRequiredToBeWellCapitalized.description: Amount of minimum total risk-based capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

FiniteLivedComputerSoftwareGross.label: Finite-Lived Computer Software, Gross (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
FiniteLivedComputerSoftwareGross.description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs to ready software for sale or licensing, or for long-term internal use.

NetCapitalInExcessOfFivePercentOfDebitIt.label: Net Capital in Excess of Five Percent of Debit Items
NetCapitalInExcessOfFivePercentOfDebitIt.description: Net capital less five percent of aggregate debit items.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options or other stock instruments for which the right to exercise has lapsed under the terms of the plan agreements.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that lapsed during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average period between the balance sheet date and expiration for all awards outstanding under the plan, which may be expressed in a decimal value for number of years.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Exercisable, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average period between the balance sheet date and expiration date for fully vested and expected to vest options that are exercisable (or convertible) under the plan, which may be expressed in a decimal value for number of years.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average period between the balance sheet date and expiration date for fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding, which may be expressed in a decimal value for number of years.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that expired.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average period between the balance sheet date and expiration for all awards outstanding under the plan, which may be expressed in a decimal value for number of years.

TangibleCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital, Actual
TangibleCapital.description: Amount of tangible capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequac.label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital, Minimum
TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequac.description: Amount of minimum tangible capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Actual
TierOneLeverageCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 leverage capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneRiskBasedCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Actual
TierOneRiskBasedCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.
